mapper.select: SELECT rn, scrap_id, userId, name, company_id, company_name, ad_id, ad_title, scrap_date FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, e.* FROM ( SELECT scrap_id, userId, name, company_id, company_name, ad_id, ad_title, TO_CHAR(scrap_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as scrap_date FROM SCRAP WHERE userId like '${userId}' ORDER BY SCRAP_ID DESC ) e ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage} GROUP BY rn, scrap_id, userId, name, company_id, company_name, ad_id, ad_title, scrap_date ORDER BY rn
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM scrap WHERE userId = '%{userId}%'
SELECT * FROM SCRAP WHERE userId = #{userId} and ad_id = #{ad_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCRAP (SCRAP_ID, USERID, NAME, COMPANY_ID, COMPANY_NAME, AD_ID, AD_TITLE, SCRAP_DATE) VALUES (scrap_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{name}, #{company_id},#{company_name}, #{ad_id}, #{ad_title}, SYSDATE)
